content:
Here is my next response:

I like those ideas for retracing my steps, thanks! I think I'll start by asking my friend Sarah if she's seen the shirt, since I was at her house for dinner around the time it went missing. And yeah, I'll definitely check my car and bags too. As for the notebook system, I'll set it up this weekend and start logging my clothes. By the way, speaking of clothes, I've been meaning to get my brown leather boots resoled - do you know if there are any good shoe repair places around?
